name: Boogie Beetle and the Bionic Tree
name_original: Boogie Beetle and the Bionic Tree
description:
Boogie Beetle and the Bionic Tree is a 2D platformer in which a beetle named Boogie tries to save his tree from the influence of the evil woodpeckers and their powerplant that has over taken the tree. 

Controls:
A or Left Arrow: Move Left
D or Right Arrow: Move right
Space: Jump
Press "Space" to start the game, or to skip past the win, lose, or credits screens.

Created for the 2017 Founder's Day Game Jam hosted by University of Advancing Technology, located in Tempe, Arizona, United States. The theme for the game jam was "plants".
